name: css-flex-align-content
description: Css module of single purpose classes for flex align content

scripts.start: tachyons src/css-flex-align-content.css > css/css-flex-align-content.css && tachyons src/css-flex-align-content.css --minify > css/css-flex-align-content.min.css && tachyons src/css-flex-align-content.css --generate-docs --package=../../package.json > readme.md
